entries.journal_entry_description: To make anything, you need the proper tools.  Alduq Besene wants to make sure that you have all the tools that you need.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Create a Wind Current Surveying Device with metals and minerals using your generic crafting tool.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Craft a Wind Current Surveying Device
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Using your generic crafting tool, craft an Ambient Solar Energy Surveying Tool.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Create an Ambient Solar Energy Surveying Tool
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Create a Flora Survey Tool using metals and minerals.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Using metals and minerals, craft a Water Survey Device in your generic crafting tool.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Create a Mineral Survey Device using metals and minerals.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Using metals and minerals, create a Chemical Survey Device.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Collect the metal and minerals that you need to make a Gas Pocket Survey Device.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Create a Gas Pocket Survey Device
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: When you have finished created the 7 survey tools, return to Alduq Besene in Mos Eisley.
entries.task08_journal_entry_title: Return to Alduq Besene With the Completed Tools
